sentences.en: a young man in jeans and a worn T-shirt
sentences.cn: 一个穿着牛仔裤和破旧T恤衫的年轻人

sentences.en: Eight drawings by French artist Jean Cocteau will be auctioned next week.
sentences.cn: 下周法国画家让·科克托的8幅作品将被拍卖。

sentences.en: Eleanor had belonged to the same sorority as Betty Jean and they were still great friends.
sentences.cn: 埃莉诺和贝蒂·琼属于同一家女子俱乐部，她们仍然是关系亲密的朋友。

sentences.en: I imagine you're referring to Jean-Paul Sartre.
sentences.cn: 我猜你说的是让－保罗·萨特。

sentences.en: I'm afraid Jean-Paul has gone raving mad.
sentences.cn: 恐怕让－保罗已经完全失去理智了。

sentences.en: If the worst comes to the worst I guess I can always ring Jean.
sentences.cn: 到了一筹莫展的时候，我想我总还是能给琼打电话。

sentences.en: Jean is ill -- she is not in good health.
sentences.cn: 珍妮病了 ― ―她的健康状况不好.

sentences.en: Jean is pretty, of slim build, with blue eyes.
sentences.cn: 珍妮非常漂亮，身材苗条，有一双蓝色的眼睛。

sentences.en: Jean is so wrapped up in herself, she never thinks of helping others.
sentences.cn: 琼那么注重自己, 她从未想到帮助别人.

sentences.en: Jean was extremely superstitious and believed the colour green brought bad luck.
sentences.cn: 琼非常迷信，认为绿色会带来厄运。

sentences.en: Jean was thoroughly cheesed off by the whole affair.
sentences.cn: 琼对整件事情彻底绝望了。

sentences.en: Jean-Phillippe had hitched all over Europe in the 1960s.
sentences.cn: 让－菲利普在20世纪60年代曾搭便车游遍欧洲。

sentences.en: Miserable, and unexpectedly lonely, she went in search of Jean-Paul.
sentences.cn: 内心痛苦、突感寂寞的她去寻找琼－保罗。

sentences.en: Rumour has it that Jean's getting married again.
She starred with Jean Reno in The Professional.
sentences.cn: 她和吉恩?里诺出任主角.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 让·鲍德里亚（法国哲学家）

trans.tran_cn: （耐用的）斜纹棉布，牛仔裤，斜纹棉布裤
trans.tran_en: a tough twill-weave cotton fabric used for hard-wearing trousers, overalls, etc
